r.s: Object oriented interface for searching and manipulating LDAP-entries
r.d:
Net_LDAP2 is the successor of Net_LDAP which is a clone of Perls Net::LDAP object interface to directory servers. It does contain most of Net::LDAPs features but has some own too. With Net_LDAP2 you have: * A simple object-oriented interface to connections, searches entries and filters. * Support for tls and ldap v3. * Simple modification, deletion and creation of ldap entries. * Support for schema handling.
Net_LDAP2 layers itself on top of PHP's existing ldap extensions.
r.n: * Corrected bug #16738 (Problem with Net_LDAP2_Filter::parse() with complex filter, when first subfilter was an combined filter too)
